Hi teams,
Thank you for your great work,

I've been using erigon to run the bsc network for a while, but it always reports this error at intervals, and sometimes it restarts after I restart. Is it because the peer cannot be found successfully? I have designated some peer nodes before, but it occasionally reports this error, how can I make bsc run more stably, thank you.
